mapper.select: select i.item_id, i.name, i.target, i.price, i.start_time, i.end_time, i.status, c.id as customs_id from Item i left join Customs c on i.customs_id = c.id where i.item_id = ${itemId}

select i.item_id as itemId, i.name as itemName, i.target, i.price, i.start_time as startTime, i.end_time as endTime, i.status as itemStatus,
-- Customs table c.id as customsId, c.name as customsName, c.tel as customsTel,
-- Image table group_concat(img.url order by img.seq asc) as images,
-- Mine table case when m.like_id is not null and m.status = 1 then 1 else 0 end as isLiked
from Item i
-- Join Image table join Image img on i.item_id = img.item_id
-- Join Customs table join Customs c on i.customs_id = c.id
-- Join Mine table left join Mine m on i.item_id = m.item_id and m.user_id = #{userId}
where i.item_id = #{id}
group by i.item_id, i.name, i.target, i.price, i.start_time, i.end_time, i.status, c.id, c.name, c.tel, m.like_id, m.status

select i.item_id as id, i.name, i.price, i.start_time as startTime, i.end_time as endTime, i.status, img.url as imgUrl from Item i join Image img on i.item_id = img.item_id and img.seq = 0 where status != 'CLOSED' order by endTime asc limit 20

select it.item_id as itemId, im.url as imageUrl, it.name, it.price as startPrice, it.start_time as startTime, it.end_time as endTime, null as userId from Item it left join Image im on it.item_id = im.item_id and im.seq = 0 where it.item_id = #{itemId}

select i.item_id as itemId, i.name as name, i.start_time as startTime, i.end_time as endTime, img.url as imgUrl, i.price as price, c.name as customsName, i.status as status from Item i left join Customs c on i.customs_id = c.id left join Category ct on i.code = ct.code left join (select item_id, url from Image where seq = 0) img on i.item_id = img.item_id where c.id = #{id} order by case i.status when 'NOT_OPEN' then 1 when 'OPEN' then 2 when 'CLOSED' then 3 end;
select name as name, code as code, target as type, price as price, start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime, status as status, customs_id as customsId from Item where item_id = #{id};

select i.item_id as id, i.name, i.price, i.end_time as endTime,
-- Image table img.url as imgUrl,
-- Customs table c.name as customsName,
-- Mine table case when m.like_id is not null and m.status = 1 then 1 else 0 end as isLiked
from Item i
-- Join Image img join Image img on i.item_id = img.item_id and img.seq = 0
-- Join Customs c join Customs c on i.customs_id = c.id
-- Join Mine table left join Mine m on i.item_id = m.item_id and m.user_id = #{userId}
where m.status = 1
